############################################# Our Features#############################################

Our Data Center

  • Tier 3+ with some Tier 4 attributes

We 100% own all our servers and network infrastructure hardware.

  • Data-center grade Intel powered Pure SSD storage (Hardware RAID10 setup)

  • Premium Canadian Bandwidth – Redundant ISPs
